summary:
I am a Senior Account Director with 13 years experience in the creative industry, 9 of those being within a digital and creative lead role. I currently work with a team of Account & Production, Strategic & Creative and Tech Savvy Heroes.  

I am a passionate, hardworking, natural leader and work at building strong relationships internally and externally – I believe this is the key to success. 

Having worked on some of South Africa’s top leading brands within some of the country’s largest companies, where I was involved in the strategic planning for multiple brands, taking marketing briefs and turning them into fully thought out actionable, 360 degree campaigns considering all touch-points and behavior's of the consumer journey – in-store to out-of-home, from concept to roll-out. Digital E-Comm Strategies, In-Store Sales/ Volume Drivers, Radio, TV Commercials and numerous digital campaigns... I ventured to Amsterdam to expand my super powers and officially become one of their SuperHeroes.

school.name: Red & Yellow Creative School of Business
Red & Yellow Creative School of Business

education.field_of_study: Creative Brand Communications specialising as a Visual Communicator
English, Afrikaans, Maths, Science, Art and Drama

profile_positions.description: I led and managed the brand development for an in-house agency, Atlas, whose main clients fit within the medical sector. I was approached by Atlas to start up, lead and grow the agency to a fully functioning and profitable in-house agency by leading omni-channel strategies and implementations to service their clients predominantly in the medical sector.
profile_positions.title: Client Service Director/ Brand Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was at Gorilla Creative Media for just about 7.5 years. I was in the role as an Account Director for 5.5 years, where I was promoted from a Senior Account Manager. I also took on the roles of a Project and Production Manager for the Brands that I worked on. 

During my time at Gorilla, I managed Nestle´, LUX (South Africa, Zambia, Mauritius), Thirsti Water, Lipton Ice Tea, Wonderbra, Oumph, Doom, Peaceful Sleep, Airoma, Jeyes, Trellidor, Shield/ Rexona (South Africa and Africa), Brut Deodorant, Radox, AXE (South Africa, Kenya, Nigeria), Stork Bake, Bio-Strath, DGC, Betstone, Bata Industrials (New Zealand & Australia), Bata School Shoes and Rivertown. 
 
I led numerous client accounts, working with and coordinating agency departments including a team of agency account managers, designers, social media managers and art directors and external client partners to prepare presentations, sales pitches, marketing strategies and implement marketing campaigns (TV, Radio, In-Store, Activations, Digital & Social Media, etc) through quality creative that met client business needs, ensuring work is timeous and profitable for agency and client.
profile_positions.title: Account Director

profile_positions.description:
I worked at Online Advertising for 4 months before I was approached by Gorilla Creative Media. Online Advertising is a below the line Advertising and Design agency, specialising in Point of Sale, Packaging and Promotions where I worked on Nandos (SA, UK, Australia, USA, Brazil, Portugal, Germany & Philippines), Nimue, Avon and Justine. 

I Managed various key client portfolios, ensuring client needs are understood and satisfied. Interpreting client needs, delivering marketing strategies and campaigns whether in-store activations, promotional activity, point-of-sale, etc by coordinating cross-functional internal teams (Production, Creative, Finance) to deliver on client sales objectives and KPI (Key Performance Indicators).

Responsibilities:

- Planning and management of point of sale, in-store activation and promotion campaigns to drive sales of clients products.
- Meeting and liaison with clients on a regular basis to discuss their current campaign statuses, campaigns coming up as well as potential creative executions that will add value to the brand and assist in driving sales objectives.
- Coordinating and project management of campaigns, including production manager, designers, copywriters and finished artists to ensure campaign deadlines are met and within budget.
- Putting together cost estimates, timing schedules and campaign proposals for client’s approval.
- On completion of a project, set up invoicing for our accounts department. 
- In-Store visits to compare client’s campaigns vs competitors.
- Attendance and leading weekly status meetings for campaigns being worked on and coming up, ensuring jobs are on track and will meet delivery deadlines.
- Monthly internal business financial forecast meetings.
- Producing Brand/ Corporate Identities for starting up Clients with implementation plans.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Thumbtribe specialises in building, developing and designing web/ mobile sites.

I worked on the client service team, reporting to an agency account director, formulating various marketing plans to meet client business needs together with internal teams (Creative, Software Engineers and Developers) delivering Ecommerce solutions, websites, programmes, apps and the sales of various digital online marketing offerings to meet client objectives.

TASKS:
- Meeting with clients regularly to discuss the status of existing campaigns and potential new campaign opportunities based on their business and sales objectives.
- Planning and project manage campaigns to achieve various clients briefs and objectives. 
- Compile cost estimates, timing schedules and campaign proposals.
- Regular communication and liaison between clients, the production and IT (Information Technology) team.
- Manage client budgets with the finance team ensuring budgets meet client expectations, not exceed and pursue new business opportunities.
- Coordinating creative department, production department and development department to ensure client's briefs are actualised and come to fulfilment.
- Weekly and monthly reporting on campaign success and outcome.
- Compiling and strategising media advertising plans and placement. 
- Assisting the Sales Team in offering a holistic proposal that includes website development as well as mobile/ online solution based advertising.
- Maintaining a prospect list of potential new projects (Leads & Potentials in Zoho CRM).
- Have knowledge of the status of a campaign/ project at all times and oversee the overall development to ensure that the project meets the go live deadline date.
- Work with disciplines to provide clients with relevant insights on industry trends, best practice, benchmarks.
- Brainstorm/ generate and develop advertising campaigns for website development team to build and develop.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Downes Murray International specialises in marketing solutions for non-profit organisations. I assisted the account management team in organising numerous client marketing briefs through direct mail, marketing and fundraising campaigns to generate sales objectives and donations. Manage, plan, quote and cost various campaigns working with internal teams to deliver quality creative campaigns for non-profit organisations.

TASKS :
- Managing, planning and organising clients direct mail campaigns to ensure their objectives are achieved by the deadline and within budget to reach the desired target market.
- Compiling cost estimates/ quotes, coordinating project plans and campaign proposals for clients to achieve business objectives and in order to meet production timelines, ensuring deadlines are achieved.
- Completing annual direct mail campaigns and seeing them through from start to finish, promoting the clients services.
- Coordination of suppliers, ensuring printing requirements and bespoke gifts are achieved within budget and desired quality.
- Regular communication and liaison between clients and suppliers.
- Managing local and international suppliers to ensure the best product and production time is achieved.
- Briefing and coordinating creative team and suppliers on campaign requirements.
- Proofreading and QA (quality assurance) of all direct mail campaigns.
- Overseeing the printing process to ensure campaign accuracy.
- Present direct mail campaigns to clients, receive feedback and debrief creative team.
- Compile campaign reports and present to clients to show the effectiveness of the campaign through quantitative data analysis.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•	Managing the waitrons and kitchen staff to ensure the best service
•      Opening and closing the restaurant and checking waitrons cash up at the end of shifts
•      Liaising with customers and staff to ensure client satisfaction
profile_positions.title: Manageress and waitress
